de.uni_leipzig.mosquito.query

Class QuerySorter

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uni_leipzig.mosquito.query.QuerySorter

  • public class QuerySorter
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class QuerySorter helps to differs between SPARQL and UPDATE queries and calculates necessary intervalls and variables for the QueryHandler
    Author:
    Felix Conrads
